thread.title: Tottenham transfer shocker: Star wants to return to former club
thread.title_full: Tottenham transfer shocker: Star wants to return to former club

title: Tottenham transfer shocker: Star wants to return to former club
text:
Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Tottenham transfer shocker: Star wants to return to former club ERIK LAMELA wants to leave Tottenham in the summer to return to his former club Roma, according to reports. PUBLISHED: 15:38,  46, Tue, Jan 24, 2017 GETTY Erik Lamela reportedly wants to return to Roma 
Erik Lamela has been in Rome this month after requesting to return to his house in the Italian capital as he recovers from a long-term injury. 
The Argentina international has been sidelined with a hip problem for months and has not featured in the Premier League since last October. 
And reports suggest Lamela now wants a permanent return to Italy and would welcome a move to his former club Roma. GETTY Erik Lamela has been injured long term with a hip problem 
Football website Squawka claims the 24-year-old is unsettled and homesick in London - a problem made worse by his prolonged spell on the sidelines. 
And Roma are said to be interested in re-signing the winger as they make plans for the upcoming summer transfer window. 
The report says the Serie A giants will offload at least one player to make room for the Spurs man. Tottenham's January transfer targets Sun, December 25, 2016
